mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.name, p.url, p.icon, p.type, p.component, p.parent_id, p.sort_order, p.status, p.method, p.permision_code FROM sys_admin u LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 AND p.type = 2 ORDER BY p.sort_order ASC
